pageContent: Objectives: Previously East Asian men had been considered less likely to develop or die of prostate cancer. Emerging research and the onset of prostate-specific antigen screening in East Asian countries suggests that this may not be the case. We sought to analyze epidemiology and molecular genetic data and recent trends in the management of prostate cancer among East Asian men.

metaData.source:
Relevance of emerging metabolomics-based biomarkers of prostate cancer: a systematic review
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35730322/
